title: Sighted - The Secret
description: He said he would love her until the day he died. He kept his promise.  In Book Three of the Paranormal Suspense/Young Adult saga, SIGHTED, Lindsay is recovering from the traumatic brain injury she suffered during a home invasion.  While she puts the rest of her life on hold in order to recuperate, her problems become overwhelming. Lindsay struggles with issues in her family, trouble with Scott, suspension from her job... And an ever-increasing need for the pain killers that her doctors presecibed for her.   Rapidly losing control of her life, Lindsay is suddenly confronted by the haunting, heartbreaking visions of a young man who wants her to uncover a secret - one that will bring her back from the edge of self-destruction.
author: Cheryl Thibodeau
